item.title: Golang | JWT身份认证

item.title: Openresty二 | postman小工具
item.description: 用到的知识点 mvc架构模型渲染库：https://github.com/bungle/lua-resty-templateresty http请求库： https://github.com/bungle/lua-resty-template 参照 mvc模型来做postman工具 配置文件说明 worker_processes 1; error_log logs/error.log; events { worker_connections 1024; } http { lua_package_path "/open_resty/lualib/?.lua;/usr/local/openresty/lualib/?.lua;"; server { listen 8080; default_type 'application/json;charset=utf8'; lua_code_cache off; location / { content_by_lua_file mvc.lua; } location ~ ^/js/|^/css/|\.html { root static; } } } lua_code_cache off; 是为了
